languages.text:
On attack, Wielder gains +3 Agility for each MP unspent until the start of their next turn up to +30.
Base Armour Property: +10% Dodge

traits.locale_text:
On attack, Wielder gains +3 Agility for each MP unspent until the start of their next turn up to +30.
Base Armour Property: +10% Dodge

languages.text: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
languages.original_text: При совершении атаки персонаж получает +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} за каждое {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, оставшееся перед атакой (максимум до +30 к Ловкости). Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} суммируется и длится до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When making an attack, the wielder gains +5 Agility for each MP they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +50 Agility). This bonus stacks and lasts until the end of the wielder's turn. Base armour property: +10% dodge.

When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi bir saldırı yaptığında, o saldırıdan hemen önce sahip olduğu her {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} için +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} kazanır (maksimum +30 Çeviklik kazanabilir). Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} üst üste birikebilir ve kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek kalır. Taban zırh özelliği: +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}.
languages.original_text: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi bir saldırı yaptığında, o saldırıdan hemen önce sahip olduğu her {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} için +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} kazanır (maksimum +30 Çeviklik kazanabilir). Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} üst üste birikebilir ve kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek kalır. Taban zırh özelliği: +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}.

Kullanan kişi bir saldırı yaptığında, o saldırıdan hemen önce sahip olduğu her {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} için +3 Çeviklik kazanır (maksimum +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} kazanabilir). Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} üst üste birikebilir ve kullanan kişinin turunun sonuna dek kalır. Taban zırh özelliği: +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}.

languages.text: Al efectuar un ataque, el portador gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que tenga justo antes de ese ataque (hasta un máximo de +30 de Agilidad). Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa y dura hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.
languages.original_text: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al efectuar un ataque, el portador gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que tenga justo antes de ese ataque (hasta un máximo de +30 de Agilidad). Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa y dura hasta el final del turno del portador. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.

Al efectuar un ataque, el portador gana +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que tenga justo antes de ese ataque (hasta un máximo de +30 de Agilidad). Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} es acumulativa y dura hasta el final del turno del portador. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者进行攻击时，每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}就会提高3点（最多提高30点）。此效果可叠加，效果持续至装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} 基础护甲特性：+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。
languages.original_text: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者进行攻击时，每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}就会提高3点（最多提高30点）。此效果可叠加，效果持续至装备者的回合结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} 基础护甲特性：+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。

装备者进行攻击时，每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}就会提高3点（最多提高30点）。此效果可叠加，效果持续至装备者的回合结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} 基础护甲特性：+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。

languages.text: Quand l'utilisateur attaque, il gagne +3 points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} dont il dispose avant d'attaquer (jusqu'à un maximum de +30 points d'Agilité). Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g}.
languages.original_text: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'utilisateur attaque, il gagne +3 points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} dont il dispose avant d'attaquer (jusqu'à un maximum de +30 points d'Agilité). Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du tour de l'utilisateur. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g}.

Quand l'utilisateur attaque, il gagne +3 points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} dont il dispose avant d'attaquer (jusqu'à un maximum de +30 points d'Agilité). Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du tour de l'utilisateur. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +10% à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.

Quand l'utilisateur attaque, il gagne +3 points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} dont il dispose avant d'attaquer (jusqu'à un maximum de +30 points d'Agilité). Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du tour de l'utilisateur. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g}.

Quand l'utilisateur attaque, il gagne +3 points d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} dont il dispose avant d'attaquer (jusqu'à un maximum de +30 points d'Agilité). Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du tour de l'utilisateur. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g}.

languages.text: 攻撃時、使用者はその攻撃の直前に有していた{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}につき+3の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}を付与される（最大+30の敏捷性）。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了までスタックし、継続する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+10%。
languages.original_text: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃時、使用者はその攻撃の直前に有していたMPにつき+5の敏捷性を付与される（最大+50の敏捷性）。このボーナスは、使用者のターン終了までスタックし、継続する。 基本アーマー特性：回避+10%。
攻撃時、使用者はその攻撃の直前に有していたMPにつき+3の敏捷性を付与される（最大+30の敏捷性）。このボーナスは、使用者のターン終了までスタックし、継続する。 基本アーマー特性：回避+10%。
攻撃時、使用者はその攻撃の直前に有していたMPにつき+3の敏捷性を付与される（最大+30の敏捷性）。このボーナスは、使用者のターン終了までスタックし、継続する。 基本アーマー特性：回避+10%。

languages.text: Greift der Träger an, erhält er +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, den er unmittelbar vor dem Angriff hatte (max. +30 Beweglichkeit). Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} ist kumulativ und bleibt bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Trägers bestehen. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

Этот {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} суммируется и длится до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

При совершении атаки персонаж получает +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} за каждое {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, оставшееся перед атакой (максимум до +30 к Ловкости).
